hopobject.name: BeagleBox
hopobject.body: BeagleBox is a set top box software stack designed to provide non-Internet capable televisions the ability to utilize streaming video from the Internet. The stack is designed to run specifically on a Beagle Board hardware platform.
hopobject.shortdesc: BeagleBox is an Internet-based video system intended for use with TV's that do not support streaming network video.
